name: King Moralis - FPS Game
description: A 7 level king game made in a classic engine called visual dark basics pro, with a complicated story line and lots of models capacity of Gameplay features for an engine from the retro era. :) A game about a knight who wakes up having a demonic dream, coming to consensus between hallucinating environments and obstacles to get to his messenger Satan with a new political message to say God, Jesus and Angels welcome demons and their followers to a new era of enlightment.
